text: cng klaw theid (muhammad) wa xo mnusʹy thanghlay thæcring chan khux rx sul khx ngxallxhˌ mayang phwk than thangmwl sung phraxngkh nan xanac hæng brrda chan fa læa phændin pen khxng phraxngkh mimi phu dı khwr di rab kar khearph sakkara nxkcak phraxngkh theanan phuthrng hı pen læa thrng hı tay dangnan phwk than cng sraththa tx xallxhˌ læa rx sul khxng phraxngkh phu pen na bi thi kheiyn xan mi pen sung khea sraththa tx xallxhˌ læa daras thanghlay khxng phraxngkh læa phwk cea cng ptibati tam khea theid pheux wa phwk cea ca di rabkha næana
